text: Arcadia is an oil painting by Thomas Eakins. It was painted about 1883. It measures 38 5/8 x 45 in. (98.1 x 114.3 cm). It hangs in the Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York City. Category:American paintings Category:1880s paintings Category:Paintings by Thomas Eakins Category:Paintings in the Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York City Category:1883 works
title: Arcadia (painting)
